CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(APT_Contract_Type__c,'New Contract'),ISPICKVAL(APT_Contract_Type__c,'DoV Contract')),IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Filing"), AND(ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"),ISPICKVAL(Source__c,"Other Party Paper"))), APT_SAP_Contracts_Record_Count__c > 0),HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementActivate?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Activate", "Activate Agreement"),"_self"),NULL),IF(APT_SAP_Contracts_Record_Count__c > 0 && OR(ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Filing"), AND(ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"),ISPICKVAL(Source__c,"Other Party Paper"))),HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementActivate?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Activate", "Activate Agreement"),"_self"),NULL))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please enter SAP Contract Number to make 'Activate' button appear on the layout
CustomField.label: Activate Contract
